properties.areaDesc: St Joseph to South Haven MI; South Haven to Holland MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued February 11 at 3:58PM EST until February 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 knots.
Waves 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale Watch, north gales to 35 knots
late Wednesday night into Thursday. Waves 6 to 9 feet.

* WHERE...St Joseph to Holland.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until midnight EST
tonight. For the Gale Watch, from late Wednesday night through
Thursday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and highest waves south
of Holland will occur from Thursday morning into the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
